text.title: part10_BDSM as business: An interview with the owners of a dungeon
text.p: Bill: I look at the girls as psychotherapists to a degree. They ferret out what they really want. They need to get close to the person. There's a chemistry between two people that happens quicker in our rooms than it does if you meet somebody for a first date or online.

p.hi: DS: What if a guy wants a guy? Is it only male clientèle that you have?

text.p: Bill: We have couples, we have females.

p.hi: DS: You have couples. Do you ever have just female?
DS: And you have just male, too.

text.p: Bill: Mostly male. But we do have females, and we have couples.

p.hi: DS: What if they want another male involved, that's not a couple?
DS: It's not one of the things that you--

text.p: Bill: I don't want to engage in it; it's not safe.
text.head: Typical requests

p.hi: DS: It's typical that they will orgasm during a session, but do it themselves.

text.p: Rebecca: I mean, some men don't have orgasms at all.

p.hi: DS: Got you. Just more of a psychological thing than it is [related to the] experience. What's typical? Something you would say, ‘Ahh, this is just a standard--‘

text.p: Bill: You want to get a bell curve. What's the average session? Somebody getting tied up, spanked?
Bill: You've been saying that for a long time--
Rebecca: Well, I saw it not too long ago.

p.hi: DS: Yeah, I recently saw that foot fetish is like the number one fetish.
DS: Is it licking feet? Is it tickling them? Do the girls lick feet?

text.p: Rebecca: No, the girls don't lick the feet.

p.hi: DS: They won't lick the feet?
DS: The guys will lick the feet.

text.p: Rebecca: Right. But there's so many things you can do with feet--

p.hi: DS: Do girls ever act as bottoms in the rooms?
DS: Ever act as the bottoms.
DS: Well, I did my research. [laughs]

text.p: Bill: Yeah, sure. Yup. Yup. Usually pretty mild sessions.
text.head: What is not typical

p.hi: DS: Are there some girls who will not act as a sub?

text.p: Bill: Yes. I don't want most girls getting bruised--
Rebecca: And that's where we're very, very different; in a lot of places, you don't have a choice.

Bill: We have a theory, and I have a theory. I have girls that come in for jobs, and I told you, I don't hire them--I have one girl that wanted to get like--there was one girl that wanted to get really--one girl, the blonde, and she wanted to get beaten, and this and that--
